title: My Hobbies
description: Tom talks about his hobbies and free time activities.
speaker: Tom
text: Today, I want to talk about my hobbies.
In my free time, I like to read books.
I also like to watch movies.
On the weekend, I play football with my friends.
At home, I listen to music.
Sometimes, I play games on my phone.
I enjoy my hobbies very much.

questions.q: What does Tom like to do in his free time?
